Title: data_scientist needs to run multiple models in parallel
Description: **Business/User Value:** As a data_scientist I need to be able to upload multiple scripts that each try to predict the same thing.**DEV NOTES**I think there will need to be a separate SQL db just for tracking the modeling outcomes as we test the system in real time.

Title: data_scientist should be able to test different models (.py scripts)
Description: **Business/User Value:** As a data_scientist I need to be able to upload new python scripts that conform to a certain standard (inputs/outputs) that are different models. The scripts will need:- Access to the database so it can query for user and content data- Some processing capacity (RAM) for training- A way to deliver a content id to the front end so that content is served to the user**DEV NOTES**We started the project working with Flask, but don't have a strong preference about which python framework to utilize or whether we need one at all.

Title: jill should be alerted when she's not watching
Description: **Business/User Value:** As data_scientist I don't want a database full of empty responses from the emotional api. If a user stops watching they should be alerted and the system should stop pushing responses to the db**DEV NOTES**??**DESIGN Notes**Mockups: not_watching_error.jpghttps://www.dropbox.com/sh/a9yqbyvqqft2w21/AAD-xB_PtnoVsv4WgyOHj-A1a?dl=0
